message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.DL, cs.LG, cs.DB. 

The paper addresses the problem of generating query suggestions for task-based search, which is a common topic in information retrieval (cs.IR) and natural language processing (cs.CL). The proposed probabilistic modeling framework involves obtaining keyphrases from multiple sources, which could involve techniques from deep learning (cs.DL) and machine learning (cs.LG). Finally, the evaluation and analysis of the model could involve techniques from databases (cs.DB).
